entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Indian Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:20 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Indian Head AAFC 12:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
Temperature: -15.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -17.1°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
